attributes.action: Include all Early Years Settings within education setting closures.
attributes.additional_details: Nursery practitioners and the children are just as important as any others, their lives and health must not be placed at any further risk.
attributes.background: The government must include nurseries in the education settings that must close throughout the national lockdown.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
